extendedInfo.description: Do you like to listen to erotic stories? It helps you to relax? Or maybe it helps you in search of new sexual experiences? This app is what you are looking for!Plenty of interesting adult stories will inflame you imagination and arouse your senses! Jump into the ocean of lust and love! Enjoy every bit of this app. Explore your sexuality!But that is not all! Download this app and receive 50% discount for the purchases of the sex toys of the "Adam and Eve" company. Tags: Sex stories, adult, sex, erotic fiction, erotic stories, sex positions, sexy girls, sexy, girls, sexy pictures, sex toys, sex games, audio, relax, sexual experience, sexual, sexuality, stories, lust, love
